alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 3:13AM MST until January 13 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Alpowa Summit, Kamiah, Lewiston, Pomeroy, Culdesac, Craigmont, Winchester, Gifford, Soldiers Meadow Road, Nezperce, Clarkston, Lewiston Grade, Lapwai, and Peck. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
